General.Name: Quoc Cuong Gia Lai JSC
General.Description: Quoc Cuong Gia Lai Joint Stock Company operates in the real estate, rubber, hydroelectricity, logging and wood processing, and construction businesses in Vietnam. It develops real estate properties; operates rubber plantations; invests in hydropower plants; and offers wood to manufacture doors, kitchen shelves, wall cabinets, and furniture for buildings, apartments, villas, townhouses, etc. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Pleiku, Vietnam.
